Uses of Class
com.cyc.session.exception.SessionCommunicationException

  • Packages that use SessionCommunicationException 
    Package Description
    com.cyc.query
    Interfaces for asking arbitrarily complex queries of a Cyc server, and processing the answers.
    com.cyc.session
    Interfaces for configuring and managing connections to a Cyc server.
    com.cyc.session.spi
    All Session API service provider interfaces.

    • Uses of SessionCommunicationException in com.cyc.query

      Methods in com.cyc.query that throw SessionCommunicationException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<Collection<Sentence>> Query.findRedundantClauses()
      Identifies redundant clauses in this query.
      Collection<ArgPosition> Query.findUnconnectedClauses()
      Identifies unconnected clauses in this query.
      QueryAnswer Query.getAnswer(int answerIndex)
      Returns the nth answer for this query.
      List<QueryAnswer> Query.getAnswers()
      Returns the list of answers for this query.
      InferenceIdentifier Query.getInferenceIdentifier()
      Get the inference identifier for this query.
      InferenceMetricsValues Query.getMetricsValues()
      Get the metrics values for this Query.
      Query Query.merge(Query otherQuery)
      Conjoin this sentence with otherQuery, attempting to unify and rename variables.
      KbIndividual Query.saveAs(String name)
      Saves this Query as a new query term with the specified name.
      void Query.start()
      Starts the query.

    • Uses of SessionCommunicationException in com.cyc.session

      Methods in com.cyc.session that throw SessionCommunicationException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CycSession CycSessionManager.getCurrentSession()
      Returns the CycSession currently assigned to this thread.
      String CycServerInfo.getCycKbVersionString()
      Returns the KB version string (kb_Num.operation_count) for the Cyc server.
      int CycServerInfo.getCycMinorRevisionNumber()
      Returns the Cyc minor revision number (akin to the patch number).
      String CycServerInfo.getCycRevisionString()
      Returns the Cyc revision string (akin to the build number).
      CycServerReleaseType CycServerInfo.getSystemReleaseType()
      Returns an enum representing the Cyc server type.
      boolean CycServerInfo.isApiCompatible()
      Determines whether the server is expected to be able to support basic API functionality (assertions, lookups, queries, etc.) A result of true does not ensure total compatibility, and some functionality may be missing or broken.
      boolean CycServerInfo.isOpenCyc()
      Returns true if this KB is an OpenCyc image.
      void SessionOptions.setCyclistName(String cyclistName)
      Sets the value of the default Cyclist for this CycSession, whose identity will be attached via #$myCreator bookkeeping assertions to new KB entities created in this session.
      void SessionOptions.setKePurposeName(String project)
      Sets the value of the KE purpose, whose project name will be attached via #$myCreationPurpose bookkeeping assertions to new KB entities created in this session.
